dataset_name: Livability Index Analysis of Different Cities
description: This dataset provides a comprehensive analysis of the livability index for various cities around the world. It includes factors such as overall rating, stability, healthcare, culture and environment, education, and infrastructure.

data_columns.name: Country
data_columns.description: Country where the city is located.

data_columns.name: Rank
data_columns.description: Rank of the city based on overall livability.

data_columns.name: Overall Rating
data_columns.description: Overall livability rating for the city.

data_columns.name: Culture and Environment
data_columns.description: Livability score for culture and environment.

source: CSV file containing livability index data for selected cities.
size: Variable (depends on the number of cities included)
accessibility: The data will be made freely available to the public.
reuse_conditions: The data can be reused and redistributed with proper attribution.
provenance: The data has been collected and curated for the purpose of livability index analysis.
data_quality_assurance: Quality assurance processes have been implemented to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data.
